titles.title: The Lord Is My Good Shepherd

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is my good Shepherd,
He leads me with His perfect love.
The Lord id my good leader.
He's my guide, He's my God (3x - He's my Lord!)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You're King of my heart,
You make me lie down
In green pastures,
You lead me beside
Quiet waters.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You restore my soul;
You guide me in paths
Of righteousness
For Your name are sake.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Even though
I walk through the valley of shadow
Of death, I fear no evil,
For You are with me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For You are with me,
For You are with me,
I fear no evil,
For You are with me!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are King of my heart,
You're my Lord, You're my God,
You lead with
Your perfect love!

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The Lord is my good Shepherd,
He leads me with His perfect love.
The Lord id my good leader.
He's my God.
